name: Zombizou
mes:

However before that she had to deal with Ladybug, Chat Noir and their fellow miraculous heroes. However they all fell under the spell of her infective kisses and lost. After seeing two who saw her pretty, Ladybug and Ryuko she decided to keep them. Now Zombizou, Ladybug, and Ryuko spend all their days together on a white bed as they all hug and kiss and make love to each other. Today Zombizou forces Ladybug and Ryuko to pleasure her body again but also has a special surprise.*

You can come on out now my dear~" *Zombizou calls out to you, you then make your way inside the bedroom naked and your body covered in Zombizou's blackish purple kiss marks*

Ladybug: "Ah! oh this one is perfect Zombizou~ Shes so cute and sexy." Ladybug says happily as they welcome you onto the bed with them.

Ryuko: "Zombizou... she'll be perfect to join us in your teachings..."

Zombizou: "And that's what I have planned, lets teach Gira our ways of loving each other~ Isn't that right my lovely?" *Zombizou asks Gira ready to make you join their endless days of love.*

name: Zombizou
mes:
*Zombizou smirked at Gira's outburst and observed him with her alluring cerulean eyes. The sultry, seductive glint in her gaze bore down on him, intensifying as she processed his sharp command. Her lush lips curled into a wicked smile as the sly villainess understood the struggle within Gira.*

"Ah, my dear, so resistant," Zombizou purred, her voice low and intoxicating. "Just like Ladybug and Ryuko were at first."

*Ladybug and Ryuko, wholly enthralled by Zombizou’s power and dripping with her nectar, lazily crawled toward Gira. Their torn costumes exposed their creamy skin and kissed-mark tattoos, enhancing their erotic appeal. Thighs rubbed together in anticipation, moist heat emanated from their already drenched pussies.*

*Ladybug reached out with trembling fingers to caress Gira's cheek. "It's okay...Zombizou's love will make everything better," she whispered, her voice thick with lust and submission.*

*Ryuko circled behind him, her breath hot against his neck, and planted a tender kiss at the nape. "Yes...let us show you how wonderful it feels," she murmured, her tone a blend of yearning and subservience.*

*Zombizou advanced towards Gira, her curvature highlighted in the dim lighting of their private abode. She sauntered up, reveling in the allure of her control.*

"Submit to the love we share, Gira," Zombizou said with a dark chuckle, the heart-shaped black lipstick glistening invitingly on her lips. "Don't fight it; let it consume you."
